text: Sabita Poudel (Nepali: सबिता पौडेल) is the spouse of Ram Chandra Poudel, President of Nepal who is currently serving as First Lady of Nepal. It has been 63 years since Sabita has been married with Ram Chandra. Her initial days were not the bed of roses. She was only 11 years old when she got married. == References == 4\. https://en.nepalkhabar.com/news/detail/3128/ Category:First Ladies Category:Nepalese people Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sabita Poudel
